text: Collegium Musicum is a Slovak art rock band formed by Marián Varga in Czechoslovakia in late 1969.Pavol Hammel - Život a tvorba (sk)Marián Varga - životopis (sk) The band is reformed in 2008 and still plays. ==Discography== * 1970 Collegium Musicum * 1970 EP Hommage à J.S.Bach/Ulica plná plášťov do dažďa * 1971 Konvergencie * 1973 Live * 1975 Marián Varga & Collegium Musicum * 1977 Continuo * 1979 On a Ona * 1981 Divergencie * 1989 Všetko je inak * 1997 Collegium Musicum '97 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Rock bands Category:Bratislava Category:1969 establishments in Europe
title: Collegium Musicum (band)
